sentences.en: Anderson was to sing at the Constitution Hall auditorium.
sentences.cn: 安德森将要在宪法厅的观众席演唱。

sentences.en: Come to the tryouts on March 23 in the school auditorium.
sentences.cn: 将于三月二十三日在学校礼堂举行预演.

sentences.en: It is hereby announced that there will be a talk on the international situation in the auditorium at 3 on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 定于星期六下午3点在礼堂举行国际形势报告会,特此通知.

sentences.en: Men in green army uniforms are sprinkled throughout the huge auditorium.
sentences.cn: 穿着绿色军服的人星星点点地分布在整个大礼堂中。
这座礼堂可容纳五千人.

sentences.en: The auditorium has comfortable seating and modern acoustics.
sentences.cn: 礼堂里有舒适的座椅和现代化的音响设备.

sentences.en: The auditorium is a building of great magnitude.
sentences.cn: 这个大礼堂是一栋巨大的建筑物.

sentences.en: The dean assembled the students in the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 教务长把学生集合在礼堂里.

sentences.en: The students streamed into the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 学生们络绎不绝地进入礼堂.

sentences.en: The students trooped into the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 学生们列队走入大礼堂.

sentences.en: The teacher gathered all the pupils in the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 老师把全体同学集合在礼堂内.

sentences.en: We were crushed out of the auditorium.
We'll have the meeting in the classroom rather than in the auditorium.
sentences.cn: 我们与其在礼堂里开会,不如在教室里开会.

sentences.en: Who will undertake the job of decorating the auditorium?
sentences.cn: 谁来负责装饰礼堂的工作?

trans.tran_en: the part of a theatre where people sit when watching a play, concert etc
